title: No. 1 Cannon Street Galeri and Kafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Re-branded as a sandwich and beer pub since Jan 2016; formerly an art gallery & vegetarian food cafe est. Aug 2015. Air-conditioned dining room with free Wi-Fi. Please specify if you'd like a vegetarian or vegan meal.
